definition: flat/level/equal/to tie (make the same score)/to draw (score)/calm/peaceful/see also 平聲|平声[ping2 sheng1]
face/side/surface/aspect/top/classifier for flat surfaces such as drums, mirrors, flags etc
thread/string/wire/line/CL:條|条[tiao2],股[gu3],根[gen1]/(after a number) tier (unofficial ranking of a Chinese city)

sentences.english: But, in general, we've done more stuff with plane curves.
sentences.chinese: 對於平面曲線，其實已經做得足夠多了。

sentences.english: Please tell me what the plane curve means.
sentences.chinese: 請告訴我這條平面曲線是什麼意思。

sentences.english: I have a curve in the plane and I have a vector field.
sentences.chinese: 這有一條平面曲線和一個向量場。

sentences.english: He then treated the evolute of a plane curve .
sentences.chinese: 然後他討論了平面曲線的漸屈線。

sentences.english: Let's say that I have a plane curve and a vector field in the plane.
sentences.chinese: 有一條平面曲線和這個平面上的向量場。
